content.description: Cornelia tam defessa erat ut tabulam amitteret.
content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: Cornelia is very tired and she lost her tablet.
Cornelia was so tired that she lost her tablet.
Cornelia had been so tired when she lost her tablet.
Cornelia will be tired after she loses her tablet.

content.answer: Cornelia was so tired that she lost her tablet.

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
